price: Ba bandi bahakanye (Allah n’ubutumwa bw’Intumwa Muhamadi), ndetse bakanakumira (abantu) kugana inzira ya Allah, (Allah) azaburizamo ibikorwa byabo.
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ وَصَدُّواْ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ أَضَلَّ أَعۡمَٰلَهُمۡ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: alladhīna kafarū waṣaddū ʿan sabīli al-lahi aḍalla aʿmālahum
translations: He will cause to be lost
